member.name: M:ARSoft.Tools.Net.Dns.DnsClient.BeginResolve(System.String,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Queries a dns server for specified records asynchronously.
member.param: Domain, that should be queried
An delegate that references the method to invoked then the operation is complete.
A user-defined object that contains information about the receive operation. This object is passed to the delegate when the operation is complete.
member.returns: An IAsyncResult object that references the asynchronous receive.
